channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Join Katey Norman at the 2024 Lift Jesus Higher Rally, for Youth and Adults, as she speaks about our identity in Christ and how He calls each of us personally to follow Him. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: True repentance comes from humility. Remorse comes from pride. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Susan Conroy shows that Christ gave us the Eucharist out of His deep love for us. We need to realize its power and give to the Eucharist our deep love, respect and adoration. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Raising teenagers is one of the toughest challenges facing parents today. Dr. Ray uses a powerful video to illustrate when and where parents should draw the line on verbal abuse. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: For The Sake Of The Gospel The Georgia Martyrs
channel.desc: The tragic story of Franciscan missionaries who left their homes in Spain to evangelize and minister to the indigenous people, 20 years before the Pilgrims landed at Plymouth Rock. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Patalinghug shows how parents can draw their kids into the kitchen to prepare some fun dishes together while sharing important quality time together. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
channel.desc: Sr. John Dominic interviews Sr. Louis Marie about teaching the doctrines and mysteries of our faith in order to form better educated Catholics. They discuss teaching catechesis using the book "Echoing the Mystery.". (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of Saint Joseph
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this inspirational litany asking for the prayers of Saint Joseph from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Mother Mary Theresa Dudzik
channel.desc: Josephine Dudzik began a ministry for the elderly, sick, and poor. She later founded the Franciscan Sisters of Chicago. Learn more about her canonization cause as it progresses. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Social Teaching
channel.desc: Taking inspiration from the examples of the lives of St. Francis of Assisi and conversion of St. Paul, Msgr. Swetland explores the notion of treating every human person as an image of Christ in the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about being saved by faith and grace, the marriage of Mary and Joseph, and where the Neanderthals came from since Adam and Eve were our first parents. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explain how Jesus founded His Church on earth to guide His followers to the Kingdom. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Truth In The Heart
channel.desc: In another lesson for Grade 2, Sisters Amata Veritas and Mary Joseph teach about Ave Regina Caelorum. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: St. Bakhita is an exemplary model for Nakun, a little girl who is lonely and friendless in a new school. With the encouragement of fellow students, however, Nakun soon discovers the joy of making spiritual exercises and becoming a child of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: The moral dilemmas that permeate his stories are a big reason why Shakespeare?s works are loved and performed. Pearce looks at Romeo and Juliet, The Merchant of Venice, The Merry Wives of Windsor and Julius Caesar. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Adoration And Reparation
channel.desc: A special presentation of the Chaplet of Adoration and Reparation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Doug and Dr. Sri discuss what can make the initial efforts of evangelization successful and how sharing the details of doctrine, rules, and regulations of practice can come later. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Family Celebration
channel.desc: EWTN CEO Michael Warsaw, Fr Joseph Mary Wolfe and Fr Leonard Mary Revilla answer viewer questions reflecting on the influence of Mother Angelica on their lives and the network and what the future holds for EWTN in the coming years. (45 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live With Passion With Father Cedric
channel.desc: Fr. Cedric breaks down the core of the Christian message, how the Gospels make clear Jesus is the Son of God, and what kind of relationship Jesus desires to have with each of us. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Family Celebration
channel.desc: Colm Flyn hosts a roundtable discussion featuring Montse Alvarado, Msgr Roger Landry, Dr Matthew Bunson and Paola Arriaza Flynn. Participants revisit their recent time in Rome covering the death of Pope Francis and the conclave which elected Pope Leo XIV. (90 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reviving The Roman Catholic Church In Eastern Russia
channel.desc: Various parishioners give moving accounts on how the revival of the Catholic Church in Russia has personally impacted their lives. (45 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Into The Breach: The Mission Of The Family
channel.desc: In a world that doesn?t value Christian ideals, how can we raise spiritually strong children? Discover what can instill an authentic desire in our children to deepen their Faith. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Holy Rosary From Lourdes
channel.desc: Pilgrims from around the world gather and pray the Rosary from the Lourdes grotto in France, site of the famous apparitions by the Blessed Virgin Mary in 1858. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Sunday Mass From Lourdes
channel.desc: (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford discusses how Our Lady is to be in our lives in 2 ways - as Our Mother and as our model for life. She brought us Jesus and She continues Her work for Him by bringing us to Him. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug discuss the ?partnership? theory of divine inspiration, noting how the biblical author plays a role in revealed text and is not simply a transcriptionist. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Korea
channel.desc: In a country that suppressed Christianity, Andrew Kim and Paul Chong Hasang lost their lives preaching and evangelizing. This EWTN original program profiles the brave saints known as Korean martyrs. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: The moral dilemmas that permeate his stories are a big reason why Shakespeare?s works are loved and performed. Pearce looks at Romeo and Juliet, The Merchant of Venice, The Merry Wives of Windsor and Julius Caesar. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Doug and Dr. Sri discuss what can make the initial efforts of evangelization successful and how sharing the details of doctrine, rules, and regulations of practice can come later. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Vaticano
channel.desc: We celebrate the newly canonized saints and hear from the niece of Saint Pier Giorgio Frassati. From Germany to Rome, we follow the ?Jesus Bikers?, and we celebrate Pope Leo?s 70th birthday! (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Church And The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Ho Lung welcomes Archbishop Nicola Girasoli, Papal Nuncio to the Caribbean Region to talk about the Missionaries of the Poor, their way of life and their service among the poor and needy in the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph and Fr. Mark reflect on the life of Mary as they visit the sites blessed by the presence of the Mother of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother discusses the various aspect of regret, remorse and sorrow and how they can be deadly or they can be fruitful. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Sunday Vespers With Benediction
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they celebrate Vespers and Benediction of the Blessed Sacrament from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. (35 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Best With Fr. Groeschel
channel.desc: Can persons with same-sex attraction become saints? Is a baptism still valid if performed by a non-believer? Fr. Groeschel answers these questions, and explains how to come back to the Church after many years away. (25 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: The Democrats for Life fight to protect life at all stages. Plus, a video course aiming to empower young people to understand when life begins. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Fr. Mark continues his conversation with Fr. Ambrose Little, OP, about the theology and philosophy of St. Thomas Aquinas and the importance of knowing God so we can love Him fully. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Icons
channel.desc: Basilio Perez is a musician who uses the gift of music to touch the hearts and minds of anyone who will listen. See how his art has become a powerful tool to evangelize, opening up his audience to the Lord?s message. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Social Teaching
channel.desc: Taking as a source text the question on divorce posed to Jesus in the Gospel, Msgr. Swetland promotes the dignity of family and concern for the common good of humanity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Donald Haggerty explains the implications of pursuing holiness in the 21st century, and how it might lead to our own mysterious Passion, as Christ experienced before death. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: While in Italy, Bob and Penny Lord recount the life of St. Clare of Montefalco, whose incorrupt body is venerated to this day. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, reveals how all of our actions bear fruit that has both personal and eternal consequences. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Marriage: For Better...forever!
channel.desc: Marriage Counsler Greg Popcak Discusses how to resolve conflicts in a loving, supportive manner that is consistent with our Christian dignity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Raising teenagers is one of the toughest challenges facing parents today. Dr. Ray uses a powerful video to illustrate when and where parents should draw the line on verbal abuse. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Extraordinary The Bill Atkinson Story
channel.desc: In this powerful documentary, discover the incredible life and impact of Augustinian Friar, Fr. Bill Atkinson, who was the first quadriplegic priest in the Catholic Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford develops the Parable of the Good Samaritan as the motivation for a philosophy of life for a Christian. Seen from the perspective of how we use God's gifts, we are called to help others on our path - not ignore them. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crossing The Goal
channel.desc: The guys show how it?s possible to be patient men of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Korea
channel.desc: In a country that suppressed Christianity, Andrew Kim and Paul Chong Hasang lost their lives preaching and evangelizing. This EWTN original program profiles the brave saints known as Korean martyrs. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Children, Behold Your Mother
channel.desc: A Rosary's meditation for Children. In studio with children conversation, meditation, singing and praying. (30 minutes).
